result.execSummary:
Jose Angel Berrios Moreno was extradited to another county, state or jurisdiction. Extradition means Jose Angel Berrios Moreno was accused or convicted of an offense in another county, state or jurisdiction and was taken there to face their charge(s) or conviction.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jose Angel Berrios Moreno

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Jose Angel Berrios Moreno not in court.  Gerad T Dougvillo appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter: Patricia Schaefer.
Defendant has been extradited. The State moves to dismiss

BTC: Dismissed

Defendant Jose Angel Berrios Moreno in court with attorney Mindy M. Nolan.  Defendant Jose Angel Berrios Moreno in custody.  Sharon Ann Riek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter: Patricia Schaefer.   Interpreter, Susan Schweigert, appeared on behalf of the defendant. Interpreter has been previously sworn.
  Defendant wishes to waive extradition hearing.  Court conducts colloquy with defendant regarding waiving the hearing.  The defendant is sworn by the Court.

BTC: Defendant freely, knowingly, voluntarily and intelligently has waived extradition. RH to be set in 10 days  Review hearing scheduled for July 20, 2015 at 08:30 am.
